name: HSP_ACCT_EBC_MADRS
description: This table contains the mother's address of residence information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account id with associated electronic birth certificate information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number associated with mother's address of residence on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_MOM_ADDR_RSDN
columns.description: The mother's address of residence on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.
